title: Font logo Chinese company
author: dartla

comments.content:
Couldn't find a spot-on match (though it looks frustratingly familiar). Charter Oak with some artificial widening gets you close:

[http://www.myfonts.com/search/Charter+Oak/fonts/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317181106/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Charter+Oak/fonts/ "http://www.myfonts.com/search/Charter+Oak/fonts/")
